page.title: 10Buildings in the Horton area
page.content: There are quite a few buildings in the area of Horton,but not much recent housing development.There are just some farms,shops,houses and two churches.In Horton and Sodbury a few buildings are being renovated because they are crumbling away.One of the buildings that has been renovated in Horton used to be the old potting sheds for Horton Hall.The oldest house in Horton was built in the 14th century and has got a thatched roof. There are two main business buildings in the area. One of them is a company called PAFEC which has taken over Horton Hall.The other sells farming equipment and is called Bill Bennet Engineering.This is a new building. There are two other buildings one is a social club which has not been built long and an old wooden village hall.
